name: mongork
description: MongoDB migration tool with MCP support for AI assistants

tools.name: migration_status
tools.description: Get the status of all migrations - shows which migrations are applied and when

tools.name: migration_up
tools.description: Apply migrations up to a specific version or all pending migrations

version.description: Migration version to migrate up to (optional - if not provided, applies all pending migrations)

tools.name: migration_down
tools.description: Roll back migrations down to a specific version or roll back the last migration

version.description: Migration version to roll back to (optional - if not provided, rolls back the last applied migration)

tools.name: migration_create
tools.description: Create a new migration file with a given name and description

name.description: Name for the migration (will be used to generate filename)

description.description: Description of what the migration does

tools.name: migration_list
tools.description: List all registered migrations with their versions and descriptions
